Oh are we introducing ourselves to Asahina?

I can best be described as a transient thought based upon biological impulses that has achieved the ability to discern itself as a singular entity in order to function in a socially constructed environment in which the rules for functioning have been created by all the past progenitors and my baseline personality is a contruction of different ideals vying for dominance against basic animal instincts in order to function well in the socially constructed environment while still being able to carry out animal instincts in a socially acceptable manner; you can call me uc9.
